author: Staff Reporter
text:
A day after three girls of the SVS College of Naturopathy and Yoga Science at Bangaram in Villupuram were found dead in a well near the institution, revenue officials sealed the college and picked up the son of the college’s administrator, a lecturer, and two hostel wardens for questioning.

The parents of the girls suspected foul play and expressed the fear that the students were killed and their bodies dumped in the well as they had confronted the management about monetary exploitation some months ago.
title: ‘College girls were murdered’
